timeline.message:
Revert "Revert "Jonmv/async doc v1 implementation""

This reverts commit c6aded1606112a54969f56403085ca90d61dac8f.
Move setPhaser to LocalDocumentAccess
Actually add test for DocumentOperationExecutor
Add equals and hashCode to some classes
Separate out interface for DocumentOperationExecutor
Add handler test and various fixes
Throw IllegalArgumentException on bad input, rather than RuntimeException
More response tests — some more try-catch
Fix tests
Register operations with phaser in the caller thread
Re-add test that was accidentally removed
Add convenience for creating a LocalDocumentAccess
Strict FIFO when throttling
Test client close during request handling
Allow closures for handling document api Responses
Simplify with closures to handle async responses
Preserve user callbacks through DocumentOperationExecutorImpl
Use named threads for maintenance
Update abi spec for application
Add thread name argument to test code as well
Enable compressed responses in feed client
Make ManualClock thread safe
Await advance from test thread to next arrive is in the intended phase

timeline.bodyText: Use the JSON assert helper in testutils
timeline.author: bjorncs
bjorncs
